## 1. Introduction


```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(readr)
suicides <- read_csv("master.csv")
view(suicides)
```

## 2. Data

```{r display-dataframe, message = FALSE}
suicides <- read_csv("master.csv")
glimpse(suicides)
```

## 3. Data analysis plan

```{r}
suicides %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  summarise(n = sum(suicides_no))
```

```{r}
suicides %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(n = sum(suicides_no)) %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(n))

```


```{r}
suicides %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>% 
  summarise(n = sum(suicides_no)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = sex, y = n)) + 
  geom_col() +
  labs(title = "Suicide Rates by Gender",
       x = "Gender",
       y = "Number of Cases")
```
